hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #northern basement of the Water Temple# contains...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Green Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple GS Near Boss Key Chest

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##the Thieves' Hideout## has #6# major items.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that in the back of the #basement of the Great Deku Tree# two spiders hold...^ #a Huge Rupee# and #a Hookshot#.
hinted_locations: Deku Tree MQ GS Basement Graves Room
Deku Tree MQ GS Basement Back Room
